name: holy-cross-college-portal
description: Full-stack application for Holy Cross College with Express backend and Vue 3 frontend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview"
